channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Social Media Share Buttons & Social Sharing Icons
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Social Media Share Buttons & Social Sharing Icons

item.title: CVE-2024-2118|2024-04-17T05:00:02.917Z -- Unknown -- Social Media Share Buttons & Social Sharing Icons
item.description: The Social Media Share Buttons & Social Sharing Icons WordPress plugin before 2.8.9 does not sanitise and escape some of its settings, which could allow high privilege users such as admin to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks even when the unfiltered_html capability is disallowed (for example in multisite setup)
